column1: Funeral Services will be held at 11:00 a.m. Friday
column3: 2015 at Decorah Lutheran Church with Rev. David Sorenson and Rev. Bryan Robertson officiating. Burial will be in Phelps Cemetery in Decorah.  Visitation will be from 4:00-7:00 p.m. Thursday
column6: and on Friday beginning at 10:00 a.m.
